# makeTouchBar()

**Instance Method**

Your custom subclass of the `NSResponder` class should override this method to create and configure your subclass’s default [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTouchBar] object.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func makeTouchBar() -> NSTouchBar?
```

## Supporting the Touch Bar

- **touchBar**: The [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTouchBar] object associated with the responder.
